awd_titl_txt: Innovative Solutions For Risk Management And Mitigation of  Damage Produced by Windthrown Trees
awd_abstract_narration: Each year windthrown trees produce                                              millions of dollars in damages to                                               structures, lifelines, and                                                      vehicles.  In hurricanes or                                                     tornadoes this type of debris may                                               even cause injury and death.  This                                              work will investigate mitigation                                                procedures by coupling the results                                              from research on tree loading and                                               response to blast waves with                                                    natural wind field model.  The                                                  combined effect of tree and direct                                              wind damage will be studied as well                                             as the effects of tree removal                                                  resulting in more exposed                                                       structures versus the risk of tree-                                             related damage.  Risk reduction                                                 techniques such as root                                                         reinforcement, tree crown                                                       reduction, and selection of wind                                                resistant species will be examined                                              in the context of new and existing                                              urban and suburban developments.                                                The benefits from this work could                                               be substantive to the population of                                             a big portion of the United States                                              subjected every year to extreme                                                 wind episodes.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Technology, Innovation, and Partnerships
